title: Digital Footprint Illustration
caption: What you post online stays online. Think before you share! Control your digital footprint.
prompt: A stylized image of a person walking leaving behind glowing footprints composed of social media icons, blog posts, and website links. The footprints gradually fade in the distance. Focus on a clean, modern aesthetic with a slightly ethereal glow.

title: Online Safety Shield
caption: Protect yourself online! Use strong passwords. Be wary of scams. Stay safe!
prompt: A futuristic shield design incorporating elements of firewalls, padlocks, and data streams. The shield is vibrant and technological, symbolizing online safety and security. A silhouette of a person stands safely behind it.

title: Critical Thinking Gears
caption: Is it real or fake? Question everything you see online. Think critically!
prompt: A close-up of intricate gears interlocking, each gear labeled with words like 'Analyze,' 'Evaluate,' 'Verify,' and 'Source.' The gears are metallic and reflect light, suggesting the complexity of critical thinking.

title: Respectful Communication Bubble
caption: Be kind online. Treat others as you wish to be treated. Respect each other!
prompt: An image of people communicating within a translucent bubble, filled with positive emojis, hearts, and thumbs up. The bubble represents respectful communication and empathy in the digital world. The background is a vibrant and diverse cityscape.

title: Privacy Settings Control Panel
caption: Control your privacy! Adjust your settings. Protect your information.
prompt: A user-friendly control panel interface with various sliders, switches, and toggles representing privacy settings on social media platforms and websites. The design is clean and intuitive, encouraging users to take control of their privacy.

title: Cyberbullying Stop Sign
caption: Cyberbullying is never okay. Report it! Block it! Get help!
prompt: A stylized stop sign rendered in a digital aesthetic, with the words 'Cyberbullying Stops Here' clearly visible. The background is a blurred and chaotic representation of online negativity, highlighting the need for intervention.

title: Responsible Sharing Tree
caption: Share wisely. Consider the impact of your words and actions. Be responsible!
prompt: A lush, healthy tree with leaves composed of positive and constructive online content. The tree symbolizes responsible sharing and the positive growth that comes from it. The roots represent the foundation of good digital citizenship.

title: Digital Wellbeing Balance
caption: Balance your screen time! Take breaks. Connect with the real world.
prompt: An image of a balanced scale. On one side is a smartphone and a gaming console, on the other side are outdoor activities (e.g., a hiking boot, a musical instrument, a book). The scale is perfectly balanced, symbolizing digital wellbeing.

title: Online Community Connection
caption: Connect responsibly. Build positive communities online. Be a good digital neighbor!
prompt: A network of interconnected nodes, each representing a person, forming a global community. The connections are bright and vibrant, symbolizing positive interactions and collaboration. The overall design is futuristic and optimistic.

title: Fact vs. Opinion
caption: Facts are verifiable. Opinions are beliefs. Know the difference!
prompt: A split screen. On one side, clear, bold facts are displayed in a structured and orderly fashion. On the other side, swirling colors and artistic representations convey subjective opinions. A clear line visually separates the two concepts.
